div.span: A Message from Superintendent Billy Walker

img.alt: A Message from Superintendent Billy Walker
img.div: It is an honor and a privilege to serve as Superintendent of Clay County Schools. I am excited about the future of Clay County because I believe that we do an excellent job of instilling within our students the ideals of honor, courage, and integrity. I look forward to working to bring more partnerships with institutions like eMINTS, Jacksonville State University, Southern Union State Community College, Central Alabama Community College, Clay County Hospital, Clay County Health and Wellness Center, Cheaha Regional Mental Health, and Alabama Department of Rehabilitation Services so that our students' possibilities are limited only by their imaginations. Thank you all for your support, and please let me know if I can help in any way.

div.span: Clay County School System Mission Statement

div.div: The mission of the Clay County Schools is to provide an educational program that meets the needs of all students. This can be accomplished through the recognition of individual differences, socioeconomic conditions, expectations of parents, and an understanding of the school system's financial ability.

span.data-value: Clay County Board of Education provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.span: Clay County Board of Education provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
